mapper.select: select feseq,mseq,fecon,feregdate,ferange,fedelete from snsfeed where ferange='all' and fedelete='N'
select m.mid, m.mname, f.femseq from member m,followers f where m.mseq=f.femseq and f.mseq= #{mseq}
select m.mid, m.mname, f.fimseq from member m,following f where m.mseq=f.mseq and f.fimseq= #{mseq}

select rnum,scseq,feseq,sccon,mseq, scdelete, scregdate from ( select rownum rnum,scseq,feseq,sccon,mseq, scdelete, scregdate from (select scseq,feseq,sccon,mseq, scdelete,to_char(scregdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as scregdate from snscomment where feseq=#{feseq} and scdelete='N' order by scregdate desc)) where rnum >= #{sseq} and rnum <= #{eseq}
select count(*) from snslike where feseq=#{feseq}

SELECT snsfeed_seq.currval FROM dual
mapper.update: update snsfeed set fecon=#{fecon}, ferange=#{ferange}, ferange=sysdate where feseq=#{feseq}
update snsfeed set sccon=#{sccon}, scregdate=sysdate where scseq=#{scseq}
update snscomment set htcon=#{htcon} where htseq=#{htseq}
update snsfeed set fedelete="Y" where feseq=#{feseq}
update snscomment set scdelete='Y' where scseq=#{scseq}
